title: Video Convert Master 8.0.8.25+serial
description:
Video Converting and Burning Solution

McFunSoftÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® Video Convert MasterÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ allow you to convert and split : AVI, MPEG, MPEG 1, MPEG 2, MPEG 4, VCD, DVD, SVCD, RMVB, RM, WMV and any most used video formats . Besides, it supports DVD burning. Six attractive templates are provided for you in burning menu. It is a home video software to realize requirements of watching at home theater or storing in PC. It is compatible with DVD burning. It is easy-in-use, only in 4 steps to burn, convert or split movies. 
We designed more Humanization and Rationalization in each interface to let you know what kind of format you are setting, and this also helps you to change the favorable parameters easily to receive the best quality. 

Burn videos in DVDand create DVD menu; 
Convert AVI, DVD, VCD, SVCD, MPEG, MPEG 1, MPEG 2, MPEG 4, RM, RMVB, WMV and other video format; 
Convert your movies in batch mode 
Split AVI, VCD, DVD or other videos into several ones 
Customizable video screen size, audio/video bit rate, frame rate 
And much more! 
 

With the combination of DirectX 9.0 and the high-speed converting encoders available, you really won&#039;t find any application that converts faster than Video Convert Master. 



Create movie DVD from video files of all supported formats with its wonderful output quality, full functionality that easy to use and multiple options. With it, you can watch them on your home DVD player with friends and family. 
Six templates are provided for you in buring menu. We designed more Humanization and Rationalization in burning menu to make burning result more attractive and interesting. 

 

Want to convert &#039;Star Wars&#039; collection from AVI to something you can watch on DVD player?

Well, 20 hours movie might take a while to convert, and you don&#039;t want to be sitting there watching Video Convert Master toggle the bits.

So, just add all AVI files you want to convert, go to bed, and the next morning DVD videos are all there waiting for you. 

Size of volumes to generate. 
Since DVD file is often very large, you could split the large movie into several smaller piece Video Convert Master provides solutions in splitting. 



Input Formats:

AVI (DivX, XviD, MS MPEG 4, Uncompressed, Cinepak and others) 
MPEG (MPEG 1, MPEG 2 Video, VCD, DVD, SVCD) 
WMV Windows Media Video 
Quick Time Apple video format for the Macintosh. 
RM Real Media 
MOV A QuickTime movie can actually be used to store both movies and sounds 
ASF Advanced Streaming Format (formerly Active Streaming Format) 
AC3 Audio Codec 3 
AMR Adaptive Multi Rate 
AAC 
VOB 
WAV 

Output Formats:

AVI (DivX, XviD, MS MPEG 4, Uncompressed, Cinepak and others) 
MPEG (MPEG 1, MPEG 2 Video, VCD, DVD, SVCD) 
WMV Windows Media Video 
RM Real Networks Video
